actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Justicar's Blade or Justicar's Blast attacks.

actions.name: Justicar's Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+5) slashing damage + 14 (4d6) poison and target: DC 17 Con save or be poisoned. Poisoned condition lasts until it is removed by the lesser restoration spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Justicar's Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +11 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 24 (4d8+6) radiant.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 19) no material components: At will: bane bless locate creature3/day ea: invisibility (self only) healing word (level 5) nondetection

special_abilities.name: Angelic Poison
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical and its weapons are coated with radiant poison. Creatures with resistance or immunity to poison or the poisoned condition can be affected by angel's poison. Such creatures have advantage on saves vs. the angel's poison.

special_abilities.name: Divine Awareness
special_abilities.desc: Knows if it hears a lie.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If subject to effect that allows Dex save for half damage takes no damage on success and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep
